row.entry: Do not repeat on related HumanMadeObject.
Do not repeat on related HumanMadeObject.

section.title: Source data
section.codeblock: --- name: IndexingStatement sampleBibs: - 8010777 fieldSpec: - 555abc trimPunctuation: false scriptInclusion: NONE

choices.choice: If two or more subfields (555abc) are present, join them with a whitespace character.
Else, output the string value of555aor555b.

stepresult.note: This example is meant to illustrate an indexing statement and does not represent a complete JSON-LD document.
